comments: Melissa is amazing. She was always willing to go over things again if someone did not understand it. The lectures may be long but they are well worth learning how to do what needs done to pass the class. I dreaded this class but I am thankful she was the one teaching it, if not I think I would not have done as well.

Melissa was an awesome professor to take for stats. Tests aren\'t bad as long as you go over the notes and the study guide she gives you beforehand. She posts everything online which is super helpful, and she is always willing to help you if you\'re having troubledon\'t understand the material. Would definitely recommend!!
Very helpful, super nice and easy going. Helps prepare you for tests, wants you to pass. Would take again!

I absolutely loved this class and she was wonderful. I already had an interest in Stats and she was very inspiring. She explained everything so clearly, was extremely helpful, & a true asset to UA. I wish she taught all of my Stats classes!

Professor Marshall is a really awesome teacher. Although the topic is a little bit complex for me, she clearly communicates, checks in with us frequently for understanding, and we generally feel like she cares about our success in learning the topic. She is a true asset to the University, and a very very good teacher. Highly recommended

Fantastic professor. Very clear in her lectures and willing to help if you need it. Held review sessions before every exam and offered extra credit near the end of the semester. And pretty enough to keep my interest in a class I had no interest in lol.

She was a great teacher!! Always helped out if you had a problem or a question. Had review sessions before every test and tests were fair and not too hard. If you need to take stats. definitely take her!

She did a great job! I really enjoyed having her as a teacher. She is always willing to help and makes herself available. I would suggest having her as a teacher. Need the book for homework and activities.
Thought she did and excellent job!
She is okay, seems a little scattered at times. She is probably not the best teacher for this class but is pretty easy going and will take time to help!
